String.Dest: 为什么打断我，愚民？我与你无话可说。

String.Source: So I ask you mortal, does one devote their entire life to a singular purpose, only to abandon it for chivalry at the moment it is within her grasp?
String.Dest: 那么我问你，凡人。当一个人倾尽一生追求一个目标，而这个目标终于近在咫尺时，他会单单为了骑士精神而抛弃唾手可得的一切吗？

String.Source: It is a lie. Nothing more than the decay of the mind, making one last attempt to circumvent its inevitable demise.
String.Dest: 这是一个谎言。没有东西比失去意识更加可怕了，做最后的挣扎来规避其不可避免的消亡。

String.Source: For her service was not bound out of some maudlin sense of loyalty.
String.Dest: 至于她的服务比起那些真正蛋疼的还是中规中矩的。

String.Source: Then do not waste my time with words.
String.Dest: 别再说些浪费我时间的话了。

String.Source: Wherever I traveled I left bones and rubble, like the scurf flaked off the skin of the world.
String.Dest: 无论我走到那里，都会留下一地骸骨和满目废墟，就像是从世界的皮肤上剥落的皮屑那样。

String.Source: However, left unchecked the disease would fester and spoil. The only way to truly eliminate decay is not to hasten the end, but prevent its coming.
String.Dest: 然而，任其发展的话，疾病最终会恶化并带来毁灭。真正消除腐化的唯一办法不是快速将它消灭，而是防患于未然。

String.Source: Your companion hopes to improve his prowess in combat. What he does not realize is that he has reached the pinnacle of his pathetic existence.
String.Dest: 你的伙伴希望自己在战斗中变得更加英勇。他并没有意识到的是，他已经达到了他这种可怜存在的巅峰水平。

String.Source: Fain, the Illusionist. Marius, the Warlock. And the cleric, Iralen, who herself left the Psijic Order to serve my will.
String.Dest: 费恩, 幻术师. 马吕斯, 战斗法师. 而艾琳，就是那个背弃赛伊克教团前来投靠我的，是个牧师。

String.Source: Your quest is dead, Dragonborn. It rots in a shallow ditch. The bards are already standing over your coffin, composing your dirge.
String.Dest: 你所寻求的是死亡，龙裔。那会腐烂在浅沟里。诗人已经站在你的棺材前，谱写你的挽歌了。

String.Source: The writer's soul lives in the pages of a book, his words echoing to the unborn across eons of time.
String.Dest: 作家是住在书页里的灵魂，他的言语能在后世回响亿万年之久。

String.Source: You ask that I devote what little time I have left to teaching a simpleton a few tricks.
String.Dest: 你要求我把本就不多的业余时间用来教一个傻瓜耍点小技俩。

String.Source: Yet much like Mannimarco before me, I left the order and their miserable traditions behind to pursue a higher magic.
String.Dest: 就像在我之前离开的曼尼马克所做的一样，我逃离了教团，逃离了他们那苛刻的教条，去追寻更高阶的魔法。

String.Source: If he cannot grasp a simple spell tome, then he does not deserve the power that lies within. Your quest is a pointless one.
String.Dest: 如果他连一本简单的魔法书都读不懂，那他就不配获得书本里蕴含的力量。你的任务还真是无意义啊。

String.Source: Your insinuation is foolish, mortal. I suspected her most of all. But not until the spell could rid itself of its limitations.
String.Dest: 在我面前含沙射影是很愚蠢的，凡人。我依然把她当做最受怀疑的对象。 除非那个法术能自己破除自身的局限性。

String.Source: Yet only one managed to betray my will, and kill the others in the process.
String.Dest: 然而只有一个人设法背叛了我的意志，并且在这个过程中他还杀了其他人。

String.Source: The blacksmith lives in every soldier who kills with his tools, every sword that twists in the belly of a man wrenching in pain.
String.Dest: 铁匠被每一名使用他武器的士兵，和砍进敌人的身体制造痛苦的剑心中。

String.Source: It will give him the illusion he seeks. Let him play the mage, until his pockets are empty, his staff is drained, and his demise is imminent.
String.Dest: 它会给他一种他病了的错觉。让他去折腾他的魔法吧，直到他掏空自己的口袋，直到他的法杖没了能源，直到他的死亡降临。

String.Source: No mortal, such magic is beyond the knowledge of these imbeciles. It is not as simple as turning water into breath.
String.Dest: 不凡人，这样的魔法远超这些低能儿所了解的知识范围。这可不像把水变成一口气这么简单。

String.Source: I did no such thing. The college's understanding of magic is as narrow as your vision. I trained under the Order of the Psijic Monks.
String.Dest: 我可不干这事。学院对于魔法的看法和你差不多狭隘。我可是被赛一个教团的僧侣训练过的。

String.Source: You think yourself clever, but your analogy is apt. The fool is better off using scrolls and enchanted staffs.
String.Dest: 你认为你聪明，但是你的比喻不恰当。蠢货用卷轴和法杖也许会更好。

String.Source: You sound plenty alive to me.
String.Dest: 现在你听着更像活着了.

String.Source: I've defeated Alduin. The world once more belongs to mortals.
String.Dest: 我已经打败了奥杜因。这个世界再一次的属于凡人了。

String.Source: Last time I checked, I didn't care what you think.
String.Dest: 上次我查的时候，我根本不在乎你是怎么想的。

String.Source: I don't get it. Is it another school of magic? Do they teach it at the College?
String.Dest: 我不明白。這是另一系魔法?學院裡會教這些嗎?

String.Source: I don't get it. Is it another school of magic? Do they teach it at the College?
String.Dest: 我不明白。這是另一系魔法?學院裡會教這些嗎?

String.Source: You certainly smell dead.
String.Dest: 你肯定闻到死亡的味道了。

String.Source: You certainly smell dead.
String.Dest: 你肯定闻到死亡的味道了。

String.Source: Why would you research the Skeleton Key?
String.Dest: 你为什么研究骨头钥匙？?

String.Source: Why would you research the Skeleton Key?
String.Dest: 你为什么研究骨头钥匙？?

String.Source: Why would you research the Skeleton Key?
String.Dest: 你为什么研究骨头钥匙？?

String.Source: Why would you research the Skeleton Key?
String.Dest: 你为什么研究骨头钥匙？?

String.Source: Why would you research the Skeleton Key?
String.Dest: 你为什么研究骨头钥匙？?

String.Source: How were you betrayed?
String.Dest: 你怎么背叛了?

String.Source: How were you betrayed?
String.Dest: 你怎么背叛了?

String.Source: How were you betrayed?
String.Dest: 你怎么背叛了?

String.Source: How were you betrayed?
String.Dest: 你怎么背叛了?

String.Source: How were you betrayed?
String.Dest: 你怎么背叛了?

String.Source: How were you betrayed?
String.Dest: 你怎么背叛了?

String.Source: How were you betrayed?
String.Dest: 你怎么背叛了?

String.Source: Yes, dragons are weak. The world has no idea that I'm the real menace.
String.Dest: 是啊，龙简直弱爆了。世人根本不知道我处在真正的威胁中。

String.Source: Yes, dragons are weak. The world has no idea that I'm the real menace.
String.Dest: 是啊，龙简直弱爆了。世人根本不知道我处在真正的威胁中。

String.Source: What do you mean by careless?
String.Dest: 你说不小心指的是什么？

String.Source: What do you mean by careless?
String.Dest: 你说不小心指的是什么？

String.Source: What do you mean by careless?
String.Dest: 你说不小心指的是什么？

String.Source: What do you mean by careless?
String.Dest: 你说不小心指的是什么？

String.Source: I don't care about your failures. I want you to teach me to manipulate time.
String.Dest: 我不关心你的失败。我只要你教會我操作时间。

String.Source: I don't care about your failures. I want you to teach me to manipulate time.
String.Dest: 我不关心你的失败。我只要你教會我操作时间。

String.Source: Sounds like a Lich to me, only your body is frozen in time.
String.Dest: 听起来像是巫妖，只是你的躯体被冻结在了时光中。

String.Source: Sounds like a Lich to me, only your body is frozen in time.
String.Dest: 听起来像是巫妖，只是你的躯体被冻结在了时光中。

String.Source: Sounds like a Lich to me, only your body is frozen in time.
String.Dest: 听起来像是巫妖，只是你的躯体被冻结在了时光中。

String.Source: Sounds like a Lich to me, only your body is frozen in time.
String.Dest: 听起来像是巫妖，只是你的躯体被冻结在了时光中。

String.Source: It was Fain. The illusion was his loyalty to you.
String.Dest: 是Fain。这幻术是他对你的忠诚啊。

String.Source: It was Fain. The illusion was his loyalty to you.
String.Dest: 是Fain。这幻术是他对你的忠诚啊。

String.Source: The Dragonborn died with Alduin. I live for me now.
String.Dest: 龙裔已经和奥杜因一起死了。我现在为自己而活。

String.Source: The Dragonborn died with Alduin. I live for me now.
String.Dest: 龙裔已经和奥杜因一起死了。我现在为自己而活。

String.Source: That will still take years. For now, the city and its people are useful tools.
String.Dest: 这会花费很多年。在目前，这座城市和它的居民们是很有用的工具。

String.Source: That will still take years. For now, the city and its people are useful tools.
String.Dest: 这会花费很多年。在目前，这座城市和它的居民们是很有用的工具。

String.Source: That will still take years. For now, the city and its people are useful tools.
String.Dest: 这会花费很多年。在目前，这座城市和它的居民们是很有用的工具。

String.Source: Exactly how old are you?
String.Dest: 你究竟多大年龄？

String.Source: Alduin is such a coward.
String.Dest: 奥杜因

String.Source: Alduin is such a coward.
String.Dest: 奥杜因

String.Source: Alduin is such a coward.
String.Dest: 奥杜因

String.Source: Arrogance killed you. You couldn't fathom a servant defying your will.
String.Dest: 杀死你的是傲慢。你没能察觉那个违背你意志的仆从。

String.Source: I wish to know the name of the one who haunts these Warrens.
String.Dest: 我想知道这些Warrens里闹的鬼叫什么名字。

String.Source: It's true value was in the mechanism with which it opened doors, whether it altered its own composition or the locks to fit around it.
String.Dest: 它真正的价值在于开门的原理，这个系统的组成部分是它本身还是“锁上"这个状态已经无所谓了。

String.Source: Aaaaayyargh!
String.Dest: 啊～～咿呀！

String.Source: Just as I used Marius, Fain, and Iralen to further my goals, so do the shopkeepers and blacksmiths further yours.
String.Dest: 正如我利用马里厄斯 ，费恩，和Iralen来接近我的目标一样，你也可以对店主和铁匠这么做，以此进一步地达成你的目标。

String.Source: The blow was struck as most of my soul remained in the void, and my body had yet to return to time.
String.Dest: 这致命一击让我的大半灵魂归于虚无，而我的身体也没有恢复到从前的状态。

String.Source: Speak, mortal.
String.Dest: 说吧，凡人。

String.Source: Ah, mortal, now you strike at the heart of it. For I am the one who put faith in the power of avarice, and my death is no one's fault but my own.
String.Dest: 啊，凡人，现在去打它的心。鉴于我信仰贪婪的力量，所以我的死也是咎由自取。

String.Source: Yet it matters not. Alduin is dead. Go forward and live your feckless life. Succumb to age and die mourning the Dragonborn you once were.
String.Dest: 可是都无所谓了。奥杜因已死。你还要继续无聊地活着。屈服于时间的流逝里，死在曾为龙裔的遗憾中。

String.Source: The fool did not come alone. He and his brother sought to serve me. Yet only one was willing to kill the other, and pay the price of immortality.
String.Dest: 这个傻子不是一个人来的。他和他兄弟都想为我服务。但只有那个愿意杀死对方，并支付得起不死的代价的人才可以。

String.Source: To stop time is to alter the machinery of our world, to cease the motion of its gears, so that all energy, all resonance, is null.
String.Dest: 停止时间是改变我们世界的机构，齿轮停止周转，所有的经历，所有的共鸣，都化为虚无。

String.Source: Having a stable of slaves is the only weapon one can wield against that most unyielding of arbiters. Time.
String.Dest: 唯一可以对抗大多数的独裁者的武器就是拥有一大批奴隶。以及时间。

String.Source: I am Dagri'Lon the greatest and most powerful mage who ever lived. But that was then. I live no more.
String.Dest: 我是伟大的帝揆仁，迄今为止最强力的法师。但也就这样了，好汉不提当年勇。

String.Source: I often forget how pitiful you are and how heavily you rely on others. But yes, this is not the same as relying on another's strength.
String.Dest: 我经常忘记你有多可怜多依赖别人。不过当然啦，这跟依赖别人的力量并不一样。

String.Source: Kill this Odahviing, and let his master rot in Sovngarde while you lay waste to all of Nirn. That is my advice to you.
String.Dest: 我给你的忠告就是，杀了傲达维英，当你在大闹（lay waste to）整个奈恩时让他的主子烂在松加德。

String.Source: Do your worst!
String.Dest: 你还是做好最坏的打算吧！

String.Source: Illusion can sway emotion, but it cannot bend reality. I tested Fain's loyalty before accepting him in my service.
String.Dest: 幻术系法术可以撼动情绪，但无法扭曲现实。我是测试了费恩的忠诚度之后才让他为我服务的。

String.Source: Take that, worm!
String.Dest: 接招，蛆虫！

String.Source: As of this moment my body would still be pristine, if not for the dissidence of my servants.
String.Dest: 若不是我的仆人表示反对，我的身体在此时此刻大概还处于纯净的原始状态。

String.Source: Come now is this your best?
String.Dest: 得了，这就是你的极限了？

String.Source: Now is the end of your miserable life!
String.Dest: 你悲惨的生命该结束了！

String.Source: So it is done. And what now, mortal? What will motivate you now that your nemesis is dead?
String.Dest: 这样就完成了。而现在呢，凡人？是什么一步步的把你引向死亡的惩罚的？

String.Source: You have traveled with me this far, worm, and yet you still beg for power that rightful wielders earn.
String.Dest: [你和我一起旅行这么久了，懦夫，到现在了你还想乞求拥有力量，好去干个合法的行使者的营生来赚钱吗。]

String.Source: You are right to trust your nose, for it reveals the truth where the others lie.
String.Dest: 你在相信你的鼻子这一点上做的不错，因为它能帮你探寻到藏在谎言之后的真相。

String.Source: However, unlike the eternal prison of a soul gem, I could return to the mortal coil.
String.Dest: 无论如何，不像灵魂石里那个永恒的监狱，我能重归尘世。

String.Source: That is why I am disappointed in you, worm, and in myself for not killing you sooner.
String.Dest: 这就是为什么我对你很失望，懦夫，没能早些结果你真对不起我自己。

String.Source: Then make it so. Destroy this world and end the cycle of decay. Do not let this false prophet Alduin steal the boon that is rightfully yours.
String.Dest: 那么就这么办吧。毁掉这个世界，终结宿命的轮回。不要让这个假先知奥杜因窃取你理所应得的利益。

String.Source: Enough! This ends now!
String.Dest: 够了！结束了！

String.Source: If one spent merely an hour of each day on the mortal plane, a lifespan could be extended to 2400 years.
String.Dest: 如果一个人每天仅在凡间待一小时的话，他的寿命可以延长到2400年之久。

String.Source: That is why you are weak. The Elder Way is not open to those who need their hands held.
String.Dest: 因此你才是个弱鸡。上古之道和不会为那些【只知索取】的人开启。

String.Source: Like the bite of a flea!
String.Dest: 就被跳蚤咬了一口！

String.Source: That is your true competition. That is why you must chase the World Eater down, before another learns of his cowardice and takes your boon.
String.Dest: 那才是你真正的竞争。这就是为什么你必须追杀世界吞噬者，在另一个了解到自己的懦弱并取走你的恩惠之前。

String.Source: Be gone.
String.Dest: 滚开。

String.Source: This is all too futile, worm.
String.Dest: 这是徒劳的，蠕虫。

String.Source: As you should have from the beginning. One with power should not deign to listen to the peasants who tug on his robe.
String.Dest: 正如你从一开始就应该做的。一个有权势的人不应该屈尊去听一个拽着他的长袍的农民的话。

String.Source: The spell suspended my body in a cocoon of lost time, at which point I would be invulnerable from all outside influence, as time passed around me.
String.Dest: 这种法术把我的身体贮存在一个失落的时间之茧内，使我免于受到外面的一切影响，即使时间在流逝。

String.Source: It matters not that an imbecile like Mercer could only see its utility as a key.
String.Dest: 像墨瑟那样的弱智把它的用处理解为一把钥匙是根本无所谓的。

String.Source: Yet two centuries later my body still continues to wait. For a spell that will never finish, and a time that will never resume its normal pace.
String.Dest: 然而都两个世纪过去了，我的躯体仍然在等待。只因那永不失效的法术，以及那永远找不回原本步调的时代。

String.Source: Any object that defies logic and transcends the conventions of our world is an object that must be studied.
String.Dest: 所有颠覆逻辑的，超越我们这个世界的常理的事物都是值得研究的对象。

String.Source: Indeed. He hopes that his immortal status will protect him. He thinks to have time vanquish you, to erode your power as you succumb to old age.
String.Dest: 没错。他希望他那不朽的生命能够护卫着他。他以为有足够的时间来征服你，让你最终屈服于流逝的岁月而逐渐虚弱。

String.Source: I have wandered throughout Tamriel since the day of the Broken Diamond, when Queen Potema reigned in Solitude.
String.Dest: 自从碎钻之日以来，我就一直漫步于整个泰姆瑞尔大陆，时值波特玛女王统治独孤城。

String.Source: Evidently, you don't care to think at all. The artifact is imbued with Nocturnal's magic. It should have been studied and researched.
String.Dest: 显然，你根本就不在乎是怎么想的。这神器充满了诺克图娜尔的魔法。它应该被拿来学习和研究。

String.Source: The assailant knew this, but the fool was careless.
String.Dest: 袭击者知道这个，但这二货太粗心大意了。

String.Source: It appears your meager mind cannot think more than a step ahead. The body in stasis, the soul is free to contemplate.
String.Dest: 看起来你贫乏的思想已经无法想到更多了。尸体里的血液已经停止了流动，但灵魂却自由了。

String.Source: He fails to see that mortals breed like rats, and without the strength to exterminate them, another will take your place.
String.Dest: 他不得不看着这些生物像老鼠一样繁殖，却没办法消除，另一只种族要取代你的位置。

String.Source: Agh!
String.Dest: 啊！

String.Source: Is that the best you can do?
String.Dest: 这就是你的极限了？

String.Source: Ugh, you fiend!
String.Dest: 呃，你这魔鬼！

String.Source: Your ears betray you, worm, just as your eyes are deceived by shadow. Death claims my body, and it hungers for my mind.
String.Dest: 你的耳目背叛了你，蛆虫，就像你的眼睛被阴影欺骗一样。死亡渴望我的肉身，渴望我的心灵。

String.Source: Is there anything you despise more than decay?
String.Dest: 有没有什么东西是你轻视而不是腐蚀的？

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: (Laughs) So the fool dies not as a wolf, but as a dog. I hope Hircine enjoys his new pet.
String.Dest: (笑声)所以这个蠢货不是作为一匹狼死的，而是一条狗。我猜海尔辛会很喜欢他的新宠物。

String.Source: Your rebellion is at an end, Breton!
String.Dest: 你的反抗到头儿了，布莱顿人！

String.Source: Eyraargh!
String.Dest: 伊呀阿阿！

String.Source: You are nothing!
String.Dest: 你什麽都不是！

String.Source: Die, weakling!
String.Dest: 死吧，懦夫！

String.Source: Filthy Forsworn!
String.Dest: 肮脏的弃誓者！

String.Source: Too easy!
String.Dest: 太容易了！

String.Source: Your shouts are no match for my magic, dragon!
String.Dest: 你的吼声敌不过我的魔法，死蜥蜴！

String.Source: Hyargh!
String.Dest: 嘿呀！

String.Source: You need to do better than that!
String.Dest: 你需要做得更好！

String.Source: I've had enough of your existence!
String.Dest: 你的存在让我受够了！

String.Source: I am right behind you.
String.Dest: 把你的身后交给我吧。

String.Source: You will not escape!
String.Dest: 你逃不了！

String.Source: You will not escape!
String.Dest: 你逃不了！

String.Source: Be gone.
String.Dest: 滚开。

String.Source: Yield or die!
String.Dest: 屈服或死！

String.Source: You have no chance!
String.Dest: 你没有任何机会！

String.Source: Is it time? What decay shall we rid the world of today?
String.Dest: 是时候了吗？今天我们要解决哪里的和平问题啊？

String.Source: Then lead. Do not waste your breath talking.
String.Dest: 那就带路。少废话啦。

String.Source: How dare you challenge me!
String.Dest: 你居然敢冒犯我！

String.Source: Death claim your fur, beastman!
String.Dest: 我要活剥了你的皮，兽人！

String.Source: Is that it? Is that your best?
String.Dest: 它就是？这是你最好的了？

String.Source: Agh!
String.Dest: 啊！

String.Source: Stand still, worm!
String.Dest: 站住，蛆虫！

String.Source: Die, worm!
String.Dest: 去死，蛆虫！

String.Source: So, what is the plan?
String.Dest: 那计划是什麽？

String.Source: You lead and I shall follow.
String.Dest: 你带路，我跟着你。

String.Source: Lay waste to your foes, and let nothing go to waste.
String.Dest: 对付你的敌人，保存你的实力。

String.Source: Watch your aim!
String.Dest: 注意你的目标！

String.Source: This is your last warning
String.Dest: 我最后一次警告你！

String.Source: Are you ready to move?
String.Dest: 你准备好搬了吗？

String.Source: Are you blind, fool?
String.Dest: 你是瞎了吗，傻瓜？

String.Source: Shall we get moving?
String.Dest: 我们动身吗？

String.Source: What is it, mortal?
String.Dest: 汝意欲为何，凡人?
